title: Can someone tell me what exactly is this?
selftext: I'm too anxious to open it and end up planting a malware in my device unknowingly in case this is a scam. So please someone let me know if this is legit or not
comments: This message is eseentially telling you that your KYC was registered with NSDL - If you bought MF or shares recently your KYC would need to be submitted .
I didn't do anything lately is why I'm more curious. Got no investment, nothing as such but thanks for giving me the relief that it's not a scam etc
